Radish Boy: One night, Radish Boy decided to play at the outskirts of the village with his other vegetable friends.
While playing, Radish Boy kicked the ball too high up by accident. It flew out of the field.
Radish Boy went to retrieve the ball. On his way back, he witnessed enemy insects kidnapping his friends.
He explained to the village elder what had happened, but the elder thought it was one of his paranoid tales.
Radish Boy looked up to the elder with pleading eyes, trying to convince the elder that he was not lying.
The village elder had enough of Radish Boy's crying and... WHACK!
Worried about the fate of his friends, Radish Boy decided to go look for them himself.
